description: In honor of St. Patrick's day, we're sharing a recipe for Sour Apple Tequila Cocktail. This festive drink is made with sour apple liqueur, apple juice, and&nbsp;tequila and has a beautiful green hue that will make you feel like you're celebrating in Ireland! Cheers!
name: Sour Apple Tequila
